headline.main: GREEKS HEARTENED BY FIRST WAR GAIN; News Published Just Before Early Closing of Shops and Offices Under New Rule ARMY GUARDS ITS MOVES Wealthy Families Make Gifts of Ships and Money--Plea for Soldiers' Garb Made

lead_paragraph: ATHENS, Oct. 31 (Delayed)--Reports of an encounter with Italian forces on the first day of hostilities, resulting in the capture of at least fifty Italian prisoners by Greek soldiers, was not published till late this afternoon. The news was devoured by persons homeward bound at dusk.
